Course Unit 4: Discrete random variables Problem Set 4 5. Indicator variables
<div class="course-expiration-message"><strong>Audit Access Expires <span class="localized-datetime" data-format="shortDate" data-datetime="2020-05-27" data-language="en">May 27, 2020</span></strong><br>You lose all access to this course, including your progress, on <span class="localized-datetime" data-format="shortDate" data-datetime="2020-05-27" data-language="en">May 27, 2020</span>.</div> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-course-id="course-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-block-type="vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-graded="True" data-has-score="False" data-usage-id="block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@vertical+block@ch6-s7-tab1" data-request-token="33238a069be111eab73e0a9bb1fdf541" data-runtime-version="1"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">1. Tosses of a biased coin</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="SY0628,block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@vertical+block@ch6-s7-tab1" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@problem+block@hw4-tab1-problem1"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-problem xmodule_display xmodule_ProblemBlock" data-course-id="course-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="problem" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-graded="True" data-has-score="True" data-usage-id="block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@problem+block@hw4-tab1-problem1" data-request-token="33238a069be111eab73e0a9bb1fdf541" data-runtime-version="1"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "Problem"} </script> <div id="problem_hw4-tab1-problem1" class="problems-wrapper" role="group" aria-labelledby="hw4-tab1-problem1-problem-title" data-problem-id="block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@problem+block@hw4-tab1-problem1" data-url="/courses/course-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020/xblock/block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@problem+block@hw4-tab1-problem1/handler/xmodule_handler" data-problem-score="7" data-problem-total-possible="7" data-attempts-used="2" data-content=" &lt;h3 class=&#34;hd hd-3 problem-header&#34; id=&#34;hw4-tab1-problem1-problem-title&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@problem+block@hw4-tab1-problem1-problem-progress&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34;&gt; Problem 1. Tosses of a biased coin &lt;/h3&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;problem-progress&#34; id=&#34;block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@problem+block@hw4-tab1-problem1-problem-progress&#34;&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;problem&#34;&gt; &lt;div&gt; &lt;p&gt; Consider 10 independent tosses of a biased coin with the probability of Heads at each toss equal to [mathjaxinline]p[/mathjaxinline], where [mathjaxinline]0&amp;lt;p&amp;lt;1[/mathjaxinline]. &lt;/p&gt; &lt;ol class=&#34;enumerate&#34;&gt; &lt;li value=&#34;1&#34;&gt; &lt;p&gt; Let [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] be the event that there are 6 Heads in the first 8 tosses. Let [mathjaxinline]B[/mathjaxinline] be the event that the 9th toss results in Heads. &lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt; Find [mathjaxinline]\mathbf{P}(B \mid A)[/mathjaxinline] and express it in terms of [mathjaxinline]p[/mathjaxinline] using &lt;a href=&#34;/courses/course-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020/courseware/Unit_0_Overview/Homework_mechanics_and_standard_notation/&#34; target=&#34;_blank&#34;&gt;standard notation&lt;/a&gt;. (You can click on the &amp;#8220;STANDARD NOTATION&#34; button below.)&lt;br/&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;wrapper-problem-response&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 1&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;formulaequationinput_hw4-tab1-problem1_2_1&#34; class=&#34;inputtype formulaequationinput&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab1-problem1_2_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab1-problem1_2_1&#34; data-input-id=&#34;hw4-tab1-problem1_2_1&#34; value=&#34;p&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab1-problem1_2_1&#34; size=&#34;20&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab1-problem1_2_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab1-problem1_2_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab1-problem1_2_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;div id=&#34;input_hw4-tab1-problem1_2_1_preview&#34; class=&#34;equation&#34;&gt; \(\) &lt;img src=&#34;https://prod-edx-edxapp-assets.edx-cdn.org/static/images/spinner.bc34f953403f.gif&#34; class=&#34;loading&#34; alt=&#34;Loading&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;script_placeholder&#34; data-src=&#34;https://prod-edx-edxapp-assets.edx-cdn.org/static/js/capa/src/formula_equation_preview.b1967ab28c31.js&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/p&gt; &lt;/li&gt; &lt;li value=&#34;2&#34;&gt; &lt;p&gt; Find the probability that there are 3 Heads in the first 4 tosses and 2 Heads in the last 3 tosses. Express your answer in terms of [mathjaxinline]p[/mathjaxinline] using standard notation. Remember not to use ! or combinations in your answer. &lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;wrapper-problem-response&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 2&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;formulaequationinput_hw4-tab1-problem1_3_1&#34; class=&#34;inputtype formulaequationinput&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab1-problem1_3_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab1-problem1_3_1&#34; data-input-id=&#34;hw4-tab1-problem1_3_1&#34; value=&#34;12*(p^5)*(1-p)^2&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab1-problem1_3_1&#34; size=&#34;20&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab1-problem1_3_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab1-problem1_3_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab1-problem1_3_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;div id=&#34;input_hw4-tab1-problem1_3_1_preview&#34; class=&#34;equation&#34;&gt; \(\) &lt;img src=&#34;https://prod-edx-edxapp-assets.edx-cdn.org/static/images/spinner.bc34f953403f.gif&#34; class=&#34;loading&#34; alt=&#34;Loading&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;script_placeholder&#34; data-src=&#34;https://prod-edx-edxapp-assets.edx-cdn.org/static/js/capa/src/formula_equation_preview.b1967ab28c31.js&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/p&gt; &lt;/li&gt; &lt;li value=&#34;3&#34;&gt; &lt;p&gt; Given that there were 4 Heads in the first 7 tosses, find the probability that the 2nd Heads occurred at the 4th toss. Give a numerical answer. &lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;wrapper-problem-response&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 3&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab1-problem1_4_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct &#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab1-problem1_4_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab1-problem1_4_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab1-problem1_4_1&#34; value=&#34;9/35&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab1-problem1_4_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab1-problem1_4_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab1-problem1_4_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/p&gt; &lt;/li&gt; &lt;li value=&#34;4&#34;&gt; &lt;p&gt; We are interested in calculating the probability that there are 5 Heads in the first 6 tosses and 3 Heads in the last 5 tosses. Give the exact numerical values of [mathjaxinline]a[/mathjaxinline], [mathjaxinline]b[/mathjaxinline], [mathjaxinline]c[/mathjaxinline], [mathjaxinline]d[/mathjaxinline] that would match the answer [mathjaxinline]ap^7(1-p)^3+ b p^ c (1-p)^ d[/mathjaxinline]. &lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt; &lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]a=\,[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 4&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab1-problem1_5_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab1-problem1_5_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab1-problem1_5_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab1-problem1_5_1&#34; value=&#34;30&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab1-problem1_5_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab1-problem1_5_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab1-problem1_5_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;br/&gt; &lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]b=\,[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 5&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab1-problem1_6_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab1-problem1_6_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab1-problem1_6_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab1-problem1_6_1&#34; value=&#34;4&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab1-problem1_6_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab1-problem1_6_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab1-problem1_6_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;br/&gt; &lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]c=\,[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 6&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab1-problem1_7_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab1-problem1_7_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab1-problem1_7_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab1-problem1_7_1&#34; value=&#34;8&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab1-problem1_7_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab1-problem1_7_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab1-problem1_7_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;br/&gt; &lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]d=\,[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 7&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab1-problem1_8_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab1-problem1_8_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab1-problem1_8_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab1-problem1_8_1&#34; value=&#34;2&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab1-problem1_8_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab1-problem1_8_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab1-problem1_8_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;br/&gt; &lt;/p&gt; &lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ol&gt; &lt;span&gt; &lt;link href=&#34;/assets/courseware/v1/da8d37449e6fe493354a22d7c5898d73/asset-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@asset+block/css_mymodal.css&#34; rel=&#34;stylesheet&#34; type=&#34;text/css&#34;/&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;mymodal-wrap&#34; style=&#34;width: 185px; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px;&#34;&gt; &lt;a class=&#34;mymodal-btn mymodal-btn-big&#34; href=&#34;#mymodal-one&#34;&gt;STANDARD NOTATION &lt;/a&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;mymodal-positioner&#34;&gt; &lt;a aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34; class=&#34;mymodal&#34; href=&#34;#&#34; id=&#34;mymodal-one&#34;/&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;mymodal-dialog&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;mymodal-header&#34;&gt; &lt;h4&gt;Standard Notation&lt;/h4&gt; &lt;a class=&#34;mymodal-btn-close&#34; href=&#34;#&#34;&gt;&amp;#215;&lt;/a&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;formulainput&#34;&gt; &lt;table class=&#34;formulainput&#34;&gt; &lt;tbody&gt; &lt;tr class=&#34;fiptitle&#34;&gt; &lt;th class=&#34;col1&#34; scope=&#34;col&#34;/&gt; &lt;th class=&#34;col2&#34; scope=&#34;col&#34;&gt;Guidelines&lt;/th&gt; &lt;th class=&#34;col3&#34; scope=&#34;col&#34;&gt;Example Entries&lt;/th&gt; &lt;th class=&#34;col4&#34; scope=&#34;col&#34;&gt;Common mistakes&lt;/th&gt; &lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr class=&#34;formulainput&#34;&gt; &lt;th class=&#34;col1&#34; rowspan=&#34;1&#34; scope=&#34;row&#34;&gt;Symbols&lt;/th&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col2&#34;&gt;These are case sensitive. &lt;br/&gt; Use the correct case as specified in the problem.&lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col3&#34;&gt;&lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34; fontWeight=&#34;700&#34;&gt;n&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; and &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt;N&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; are different.&lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col3&#34;&gt; Do NOT enter x for X&lt;/td&gt; &lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr class=&#34;formulainput&#34;&gt; &lt;th class=&#34;col1&#34; rowspan=&#34;1&#34; scope=&#34;row&#34;&gt;Parentheses&lt;/th&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col2&#34;&gt;Match each open parenthesis with a close parenthesis.&lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col3&#34;&gt; &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col4&#34;/&gt; &lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr class=&#34;formulainput&#34;&gt; &lt;th class=&#34;col1&#34; rowspan=&#34;1&#34; scope=&#34;row&#34;&gt;Elementary arithmetic operations&lt;/th&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col2&#34;&gt;Use the symbols &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt;+&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt;,&lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt;-&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt;,&lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt;*&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt;,&lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt;/&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; for addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division, respectively. &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col3&#34;&gt;Enter &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt; 1+b*c-d/e&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; for \( \displaystyle 1+bc-d/e \) &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col4&#34;&gt; &lt;/td&gt; &lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr class=&#34;formulainput&#34;&gt; &lt;th class=&#34;col1&#34; rowspan=&#34;1&#34; scope=&#34;row&#34;/&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col2&#34;&gt;For multiplication, use &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt;*&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; explicitly. &lt;br/&gt; Although the &#39;&#39;pretty&#39;&#39; display underneath your answer looks correct if you do not include &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt; * &lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; s, your answer will be marked incorrect! &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col3&#34;&gt; Enter &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt; b*c &lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; for \( \displaystyle bc \) in the example above &lt;br/&gt; Enter &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt; 2*n*(n+1)&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; for \( \displaystyle 2n(n+1) \) &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col4&#34;&gt; Do NOT enter bc for \( \displaystyle bc \) &lt;br/&gt; Do NOT enter 2n(n+1) for \( \displaystyle 2n(n+1) \) &lt;/td&gt; &lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr class=&#34;formulainput&#34;&gt; &lt;th class=&#34;col1&#34; rowspan=&#34;1&#34; scope=&#34;row&#34;&gt; Exponents&lt;/th&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col2&#34;&gt;Use the symbol &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt; ^&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; to denote exponentiation.&lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col3&#34;&gt;Enter &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt; 2^n&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; for \( \displaystyle 2^n \) &lt;br/&gt; Enter &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt; x^(n+1)&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; for \( \displaystyle x^{n+1} \) &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col4&#34;&gt; &lt;/td&gt; &lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr class=&#34;formulainput&#34;&gt; &lt;th class=&#34;col1&#34; rowspan=&#34;1&#34; scope=&#34;row&#34;&gt;Square root &lt;/th&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col2&#34;&gt;use the string of letters &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt; sqrt&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt;, followed by enclosing what is under the square root in parentheses. &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col3&#34;&gt;Enter &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt; sqrt(-1)&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; for \( \displaystyle \sqrt{-1} \) &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col4&#34;&gt; &lt;/td&gt; &lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr class=&#34;formulainput&#34;&gt; &lt;th class=&#34;col1&#34; rowspan=&#34;1&#34; scope=&#34;row&#34;&gt;Mathematical &lt;br/&gt; constants &lt;/th&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col2&#34;&gt;Use the symbol &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt;e &lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; for the base of the natural logarithm, \(e\).&lt;br/&gt; Use the string of letters &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt;pi &lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; for \(\pi\). &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col3&#34;&gt;Enter &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt;e^(i*(pi))+1&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; for \(\displaystyle e^{i\pi}+1 \) &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col4&#34;&gt; &lt;/td&gt; &lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr class=&#34;formulainput&#34;&gt; &lt;th class=&#34;col1&#34; rowspan=&#34;1&#34; scope=&#34;row&#34;&gt;Order of operations &lt;/th&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col2&#34;&gt; 1) parentheses&lt;br/&gt; 2) exponents and roots&lt;br/&gt; 3) multiplication and division&lt;br/&gt; 4) addition and subtraction&lt;br/&gt; When in doubt, use additional parentheses to remove possible ambiguitites. &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col3&#34;&gt; Enter &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt;a/b*c&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; for \(\displaystyle \frac{a}{b}\cdot c\) &lt;br/&gt; Enter &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt;a/(b*c)&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; for \(\displaystyle \frac{a}{bc}\) &lt;br/&gt; Enter &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt;(1/sqrt(2*(pi)))*e^(-(x^2)/2)&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; for \(\displaystyle \frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}}e^{-\frac{x^2}{2}}\) &lt;br/&gt; &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col4&#34;&gt; Do NOT enter a/b*c for \(\displaystyle \frac{a}{bc}\) &lt;/td&gt; &lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr class=&#34;formulainput&#34;&gt; &lt;th class=&#34;col1&#34; rowspan=&#34;1&#34; scope=&#34;row&#34;&gt;Natural logarithm &lt;/th&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col2&#34;&gt;Although in lectures and solved problems we will sometimes use the notation &#39;&#39;log&#39;&#39; (instead of &#39;&#39;ln&#39;&#39;), you should use the string of letters &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt;ln&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt;, followed by the argument enclosed in parentheses. &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col3&#34;&gt; Enter &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt;ln(2*x)&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; for \(\displaystyle \ln(2x)\) &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col4&#34;&gt; Do NOT enter log(2*x) for \(\displaystyle \ln(2x)\) &lt;/td&gt; &lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr class=&#34;formulainput&#34;&gt; &lt;th class=&#34;col1&#34; rowspan=&#34;1&#34; scope=&#34;row&#34;&gt;Trigonometric &lt;br/&gt;functions &lt;/th&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col2&#34;&gt;Use the usual 3-letter symbols to denote the standard trigonometric functions &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col3&#34;&gt; Enter &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt;sin(x)&lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; for \(\displaystyle \sin(x)\) &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col4&#34;&gt; Do NOT enter sin x for \(\displaystyle \sin(x)\) &lt;/td&gt; &lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr class=&#34;formulainput&#34;&gt; &lt;th class=&#34;col1&#34; rowspan=&#34;1&#34; scope=&#34;row&#34;&gt;Greek letters &lt;/th&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col2&#34;&gt;Use the Latin-character name to denote each Greek letter &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col3&#34;&gt;Enter &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt;lambda*e^(-lambda*t) &lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; for \( \lambda e^{-\lambda t} \)&lt;br/&gt; Enter &lt;b&gt;&lt;font color=&#34;#0247FE&#34;&gt;mu*alpha*theta &lt;/font&gt;&lt;/b&gt; for \(\\mu\alpha\theta \) &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col4&#34;&gt; &lt;/td&gt; &lt;/tr&gt; &lt;tr class=&#34;formulainput&#34;&gt; &lt;th class=&#34;col1&#34; rowspan=&#34;1&#34; scope=&#34;row&#34;&gt;Factorials, permutations, combinations &lt;/th&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col2&#34;&gt;You will not need enter these for any symbolic answers. &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col3&#34;&gt; &lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;col4&#34;&gt;Do NOT use ! in your answers as it will not be evaluated correctly! &lt;/td&gt; &lt;/tr&gt; &lt;/tbody&gt; &lt;/table&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;mymodal-footer&#34;&gt; &lt;a class=&#34;mymodal-btn&#34; href=&#34;#&#34;&gt;Close Guide&lt;/a&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;solution-span&#34;&gt; &lt;span id=&#34;solution_hw4-tab1-problem1_solution_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;action&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;hidden&#34; name=&#34;problem_id&#34; value=&#34;Problem 1. Tosses of a biased coin&#34; /&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;submit-attempt-container&#34;&gt; &lt;button type=&#34;button&#34; class=&#34;submit btn-brand&#34; data-submitting=&#34;Submitting&#34; data-value=&#34;Submit&#34; data-should-enable-submit-button=&#34;False&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;submission_feedback_hw4-tab1-problem1&#34; disabled&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;submit-label&#34;&gt;Submit&lt;/span&gt; &lt;/button&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;submission-feedback&#34; id=&#34;submission_feedback_hw4-tab1-problem1&#34;&gt; You have used 2 of 5 attempts &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;Some problems have options such as save, reset, hints, or show answer. These options follow the Submit button.&lt;/span&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;problem-action-buttons-wrapper&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;problem-action-button-wrapper&#34;&gt; &lt;button type=&#34;button&#34; class=&#34;show problem-action-btn btn-default btn-small&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;hw4-tab1-problem1-problem-title&#34;&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;icon fa fa-info-circle&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;show-label&#34;&gt;Show Answer&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/button&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;notification warning notification-gentle-alert is-hidden&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;icon fa fa-exclamation-circle&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;&gt;&lt;/span&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;notification-message&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;hw4-tab1-problem1-problem-title&#34;&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;notification-btn-wrapper&#34;&gt; &lt;button type=&#34;button&#34; class=&#34;btn btn-default btn-small notification-btn review-btn sr&#34;&gt;Review&lt;/button&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;notification warning notification-save is-hidden&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;icon fa fa-save&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;&gt;&lt;/span&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;notification-message&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;hw4-tab1-problem1-problem-title&#34;&gt;None &lt;/span&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;notification-btn-wrapper&#34;&gt; &lt;button type=&#34;button&#34; class=&#34;btn btn-default btn-small notification-btn review-btn sr&#34;&gt;Review&lt;/button&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;notification general notification-show-answer is-hidden&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;icon fa fa-info-circle&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;&gt;&lt;/span&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;notification-message&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;hw4-tab1-problem1-problem-title&#34;&gt;Answers are displayed within the problem &lt;/span&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;notification-btn-wrapper&#34;&gt; &lt;button type=&#34;button&#34; class=&#34;btn btn-default btn-small notification-btn review-btn sr&#34;&gt;Review&lt;/button&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt; " data-graded="True"> <p id="thread-show-template"> <div class="discussion-post"> <header class="post-header"> <% if (!readOnly) { %> <div class="post-header-actions"> <%= /* xss-lint: disable=underscore-not-escaped */ _.template( $('#forum-actions').html())( { contentId: cid, contentType: 'post', primaryActions: ['vote', 'follow'], secondaryActions: ['pin', 'edit', 'delete', 'report', 'close'], readOnly: readOnly } ) %> </div> <% } %> <div class="post-header-content"> <h<%- startHeader %> class="post-title"><%- title %></h<%- startHeader%>> <p class="posted-details"> <% var timeAgoHtml = interpolate( '<span class="timeago" title="%(created_at)s">%(created_at)s</span>', {created_at: created_at}, true ); var postedTimeAgoMessage; // Using a separate message to ensure proper translation for different languages // thread_type describes the kind of post this is (e.g. "question" or "discussion"); // time_ago is how much time has passed since the post was created (e.g. "4 hours ago") if (thread_type === 'discussion') { postedTimeAgoMessage = gettext('discussion posted %(time_ago)s by %(author)s'); } else { postedTimeAgoMessage = gettext('question posted %(time_ago)s by %(author)s'); } %> <%= /* xss-lint: disable=underscore-not-escaped */ interpolate(_.escape(postedTimeAgoMessage), {time_ago: timeAgoHtml, author: author_display}, true) %> </p> <div class="post-labels"> <span class="post-label aria-hidden="true"></span><%- gettext("Reported") %> </span> <span class="post-label post-label-closed"> <span class="icon fa fa-lock" aria-hidden="true"></span><%- gettext("Closed") %> </span> </div> </div> </header> <div class="post-body"><%- body %></div> <div class="post-context"> <% if (mode === "tab" && obj.courseware_url) { %> <% var courseware_title_linked = interpolate( '<a interpolate( _.escape(gettext('Related to: %(courseware_title_linked)s')), {courseware_title_linked: courseware_title_linked}, true ) %> <% } %> <div class="group-visibility-label"> <% if is visible to everyone.') %> <% } %> </div> </div> </div> </script> <script aria-hidden="true" type="text/template" id="thread-edit-template"> <h<%- startHeader%> class="thread-title"><%- gettext("Editing post") %></h<%- startHeader%>> <ul class="post-errors"></ul> <div class="forum-edit-post-form-wrapper"></div> <div class="post-field"> <label class="field-label" for='edit-discussion-forum-title'> <span class="field-label-text"><%- gettext("Title") %></span> <div class="field-help" id="field_help_title"> <%- gettext("Add a clear and descriptive title to encourage participation. (Required)") %> </div> <input id='edit-discussion-forum-title' aria-describedby="field_help_title" type="text" class="edit-post-title field-input" name="title" value="<%- title %>"> </label> </div> <div class="form-row post-field"> <p class="sr-only field-help" id="edit-post-editor-description"><%- gettext('Edit your post below.') %></p> <div class="edit-post-body" aria-describedby="edit-post-editor-description" name="body"><%- body %></div> </div> <button type="submit" id="edit-post-submit" class="btn btn-primary submit post-update"><%- gettext("Update post") %></button> <button class="btn btn-outline-primary post-cancel"><%- gettext("Cancel") %></button> </script> <script aria-hidden="true" type="text/template" id="thread-response-template"> <div class="discussion-response"></div> <button class="btn-link action-show-comments"> <% var fmts = ngettext("Show Comment (%(num_comments)s)", "Show Comments (%(num_comments)s)", comments.length); print(interpolate(fmts, {num_comments: comments.length}, true)); %> <span class="icon fa fa-caret-down" aria-hidden="true"></span> </button> <ol class="comments"> <li class="new-comment"> <% if (create_sub_comment && !readOnly) { %> <form class="comment-form" data-id="<%- wmdId %>"> <ul class="discussion-errors"></ul> <label class="sr" for="add-new-comment-<%- wmdId %>"><%- gettext("Add a comment") %></label> <div class="comment-body" id="add-new-comment-<%- wmdId %>" data-id="<%- wmdId %>" data-placeholder="<%- gettext('Add a comment') %>"></div> <div class="comment-post-control"> <button class="btn btn-primary discussion-submit-comment control-button"><%- gettext("Submit") %></button> </div> </form> <% } %> </li> </ol> </script> <script aria-hidden="true" type="text/template" id="thread-response-show-template"> <header class="response-header"> <div class="response-header-content"> <%= HtmlUtils.HTML(author_display) %> <p class="posted-details"> <span class="timeago" title="<%= HtmlUtils.HTML(created_at) %>"><%= HtmlUtils.HTML(created_at) %></span> <% if (obj.endorsement && obj.endorsed) { %> - <% var fmt = null; if (thread.get("thread_type") == "question") { if (endorsement.username) { // Translators: time_ago is a placeholder for a fuzzy, relative timestamp // like "4 hours ago" or "about a month ago" fmt = gettext("marked as answer %(time_ago)s by %(user)s"); } else { // Translators: time_ago is a placeholder for a fuzzy, relative timestamp // like "4 hours ago" or "about a month ago" fmt = gettext("marked as answer %(time_ago)s"); } } else { if (endorsement.username) { // Translators: time_ago is a placeholder for a fuzzy, relative timestamp // like "4 hours ago" or "about a month ago" fmt = gettext("endorsed %(time_ago)s by %(user)s"); } else { // Translators: time_ago is a placeholder for a fuzzy, relative timestamp // like "4 hours ago" or "about a month ago" fmt = gettext("endorsed %(time_ago)s"); } } var time_ago = interpolate( '<span class="timeago" title="%(time)s">%(time)s</span>', {time: endorsement.time}, true ); %> <%= /* xss-lint: disable=underscore-not-escaped */ interpolate(fmt, {time_ago: time_ago, user: endorser_display}, true) %> <% } %> </p> <div class="post-labels"> <span class="post-label post-label-reported"> <span class="icon fa fa-flag" aria-hidden="true"></span><%- gettext("Reported") %> </span> </div> </div> <div class="response-header-actions"> <%= /* xss-lint: disable=underscore-not-escaped */ _.template( $('#forum-actions').html())( { contentId: cid, contentType: 'response', primaryActions: ['vote', thread.get('thread_type') == 'question' ? 'answer' : 'endorse'], secondaryActions: ['edit', 'delete', 'report'], readOnly: readOnly } ) %> </div> </header> <div class="response-body"><%- body %></div> </script> <script aria-hidden="true" type="text/template" id="thread-response-edit-template"> <div class="edit-post-form"> <h<%- startHeader %>><%- gettext("Editing response") %></h<%- startHeader %>> <ul class="edit-post-form-errors"></ul> <div class="form-row"> <div class="edit-post-body" name="body" data-id="<%- id %>"><%- body %></div> </div> <button type="submit" id="edit-response-submit"class="btn btn-primary post-update"><%- gettext("Update response") %></button> <button class="btn btn-outline-primary post-cancel"><%- gettext("Cancel") %></button> </div> </script> <script aria-hidden="true" type="text/template" id="response-comment-show-template"> <div class="discussion-comment" id="comment_<%- id %>"> <div class="response-body"><%- body %></div> <%= /* xss-lint: disable=underscore-not-escaped */ _.template( $('#forum-actions').html())( { contentId: cid, contentType: 'comment', primaryActions: [], secondaryActions: ['edit', 'delete', 'report'], readOnly: readOnly } ) %> <p class="posted-details"> <% var time_ago = interpolate( '<span class="timeago" title="%(time)s">%(time)s</span>', {time: created_at}, true ); %> <%= /* xss-lint: disable=underscore-not-escaped */ interpolate( // Translators: 'timeago' is a placeholder for a fuzzy, relative timestamp (see: https://github.com/rmm5t/jquery-timeago) gettext("posted %(time_ago)s by %(author)s"), {time_ago: time_ago, author: author_display}, true ) %> </p> <div class="post-labels"> <span class="post-label post-label-reported"> <span class="icon fa fa-flag" aria-hidden="true"></span><%- gettext("Reported") %> </span> </div> </div> </script> <script aria-hidden="true" type="text/template" id="response-comment-edit-template"> <div class="edit-post-form" id="comment_<%- id %>"> <h<%- startHeader %> ><%- gettext("Editing comment") %></h<%- startHeader%>> <ul class="edit-comment-form-errors"></ul> <div class="form-row"> <div class="edit-comment-body" name="body" data-id="<%- id %>"><%- body %></div> </div> <button type="submit" id="edit-comment-submit" class="btn btn-primary post-update"><%- gettext("Update comment") %></button> <button class="btn btn-outline-primary post-cancel"><%- gettext("Cancel") %></button> </div> </script> <script aria-hidden="true" type="text/template" id="thread-list-item-template"> <li data-id="<%- id %>" class="forum-nav-thread<% if (!hideReadState && neverRead) { %> never-read<% } %>"> <a href="<%- threadUrl %>" class="forum-nav-thread-link"> <div class="forum-nav-thread-wrapper-0"> <% var icon_class, sr_text; if (thread_type === "discussion") { icon_class = "fa-comments"; // Translators: This is a label for a Discussion forum thread sr_text = gettext("discussion"); } else if (endorsed) { icon_class = "fa-check-square-o"; // Translators: This is a label for a Question forum thread with a marked answer sr_text = gettext("answered question"); } else { icon_class = "fa-question"; // Translators: This is a label for a Question forum thread without a marked answer sr_text = gettext("unanswered question"); } %> <span class="sr"><%= HtmlUtils.HTML(sr_text) %></span> <span class="icon fa <%- icon_class %>" aria-hidden="true"></span> </div><div class="forum-nav-thread-wrapper-1"> <span class="forum-nav-thread-title"><%- title %></span> <% if (showThreadPreview){ %> <div class="thread-preview-body"><%- threadPreview %></div> <% } %> <% if(typeof(subscribed) === "undefined") { var subscribed = null; } %> <% if(pinned || subscribed || staff_authored || community_ta_authored) { %> <ul class="forum-nav-thread-labels"> <% if (pinned) { %> <li class="post-label post-label-pinned"> <span class="icon fa fa-thumb-tack" aria-hidden="true"></span> <% // Translators: This is a label for a forum thread that has been pinned %> <%- gettext("Pinned") %> </li> <% } %> <% if (subscribed) { %> <li class="post-label post-label-following"> <span class="icon fa fa-star" aria-hidden="true"></span> <% // Translators: This is a label for a forum thread that the user is subscribed to %> <%- gettext("Following") %> </li> <% } %> <% if (staff_authored) { %> <li class="post-label post-label-by-staff"> <span class="icon fa fa-user" aria-hidden="true"></span> <% // Translators: This is a label for a forum thread that was authored by a member of the course staff %> <%- gettext("Staff") %> </li> <% } %> <% if (community_ta_authored) { %> <li class="post-label post-label-by-community-ta"> <span class="icon fa fa-user" aria-hidden="true"></span> <% // Translators: This is a label for a forum thread that was authored by a community TA %> <%- gettext("Community TA") %> </li> <% } %> </ul> <% } %> </div><div class="forum-nav-thread-wrapper-2"> <% // Translators: 'votes_count' is a numerical placeholder for a specific discussion thread; 'span_start' and 'span_end' placeholders refer to HTML markup. Please translate the word 'votes'. var fmt = ngettext( "%(votes_count)s%(span_start)s vote %(span_end)s", "%(votes_count)s%(span_start)s votes %(span_end)s", votes['up_count'] ); %> <span class="forum-nav-thread-votes-count"> +<%= /* xss-lint: disable=underscore-not-escaped */ interpolate(fmt, { votes_count: votes['up_count'], span_start: '<span class="sr">', span_end: '</span>' }, true) %> </span> <% if (!hideReadState && !neverRead && unread_comments_count > 0) { %> <span class="forum-nav-thread-unread-comments-count"> <%- StringUtils.interpolate( gettext('{unread_comments_count} new'), {unread_comments_count: unread_comments_count} ) %> </span> <% } %> <span class="forum-nav-thread-comments-count"> <% var fmt; // Counts in data do not include the post itself, but the UI should var data = { 'span_sr_open': '<span class="sr">', 'span_close': '</span>', 'unread_comments_count': unread_comments_count + (read ? 0 : 1), 'comments_count': comments_count + 1 }; if (unread_comments_count > 0) { // Translators: 'comments_count' and 'unread_comments_count' are numerical placeholders for a specific discussion thread; 'span_*' placeholders refer to HTML markup. Please translate the word 'comments'. fmt = gettext('%(comments_count)s %(span_sr_open)scomments (%(unread_comments_count)s unread comments)%(span_close)s'); } else { // Translators: 'comments_count' is a numerical placeholder for a specific discussion thread; 'span_*' placeholders refer to HTML markup. Please translate the word 'comments'. fmt = gettext('%(comments_count)s %(span_sr_open)scomments %(span_close)s'); } print(interpolate(fmt, data, true)); %> </span> </div> </a> </li> </script> <script aria-hidden="true" type="text/template" id="search-alert-template"> <div class="search-alert <%- css_class %>" id="search-alert-<%- cid %>"> <div class="search-alert-content"> <p class="message"><%= HtmlUtils.ensureHtml(messageHtml) %></p> </div> <div class="search-alert-controls"> <button class="btn-link dismiss control control-dismiss" title="<%- gettext('Close') %>"> <span class="icon fa fa-remove" aria-hidden="true"></span> </button> </div> </div> </script> <script aria-hidden="true" type="text/template" id="new-post-template"> <form class="forum-new-post-form"> <h<%- startHeader %> class="thread-title"><%- gettext("Add a Post") %></h<%- startHeader %>> <% if (mode === 'inline') { %> <button class="btn btn-outline-primary btn-default add-post-cancel"> <span class="sr"><%- gettext('Cancel') %></span> <span class="fa fa-close" aria-hidden="true"></span> </button> <% } %> <ul class="post-errors" style="display: none"></ul> <div class="forum-new-post-form-wrapper"></div> <% if (group_options) { %> <div class="post-field group-selector-wrapper <% if (!is_commentable_divided) { print('disabled'); } %>> <option value=""><%- gettext("All Groups") %></option> <% _.each(group_options, function(opt) { %> <option value="<%- opt.value %>" <% if (opt.selected) { print("selected"); } %>><%- opt.text %></option> <% }); %> </select> </div> </label> </div> <% } %> <div class="post-field group-visibility" id="wrapper-visibility-message"></div> <div class="post-field"> <label class="field-label" for='discussion-forum-title'> <span class="field-label-text"><%- gettext("Title") %></span> <div class="field-help" id="field_help_title"> <%- gettext("Add a clear and descriptive title to encourage participation. Tosses of a biased coin </div> </div> <button class="discussion-show btn" data-discussion-id="6431x_1T2020_discussion_ch6-s7-tab1_discussion" > <span class="button-text">Show Discussion</span> </button> </div> <script type="text/javascript"> var $$course_id = "course\u002Dv1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020"; function DiscussionInlineBlock(runtime, element) { 'use strict'; var el = $(element).find('.discussion-module'); new DiscussionInlineView({ el: el, readOnly: el.data('read-only') }); } </script> </div> </div> </div> </div>
<div class="course-expiration-message"><strong>Audit Access Expires <span class="localized-datetime" data-format="shortDate" data-datetime="2020-05-27" data-language="en">May 27, 2020</span></strong><br>You lose all access to this course, including your progress, on <span class="localized-datetime" data-format="shortDate" data-datetime="2020-05-27" data-language="en">May 27, 2020</span>.</div> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-course-id="course-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-block-type="vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-graded="True" data-has-score="False" data-usage-id="block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@vertical+block@ch6-s7-tab2" data-request-token="33238a069be111eab73e0a9bb1fdf541" data-runtime-version="1"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">2. Three-sided dice</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="SY0628,block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@vertical+block@ch6-s7-tab2" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@problem+block@hw4-tab2-problem2"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-problem xmodule_display xmodule_ProblemBlock" data-course-id="course-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="problem" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-graded="True" data-has-score="True" data-usage-id="block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@problem+block@hw4-tab2-problem2" data-request-token="33238a069be111eab73e0a9bb1fdf541" data-runtime-version="1"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "Problem"} </script> <div id="problem_hw4-tab2-problem2" class="problems-wrapper" role="group" aria-labelledby="hw4-tab2-problem2-problem-title" data-problem-id="block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@problem+block@hw4-tab2-problem2" data-url="/courses/course-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020/xblock/block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@problem+block@hw4-tab2-problem2/handler/xmodule_handler" data-problem-score="9" data-problem-total-possible="9" data-attempts-used="1" data-content=" &lt;h3 class=&#34;hd hd-3 problem-header&#34; id=&#34;hw4-tab2-problem2-problem-title&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@problem+block@hw4-tab2-problem2-problem-progress&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34;&gt; Problem 2. Three-sided dice &lt;/h3&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;problem-progress&#34; id=&#34;block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@problem+block@hw4-tab2-problem2-problem-progress&#34;&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;problem&#34;&gt; &lt;div&gt; &lt;p&gt; We have two fair three-sided dice, indexed by [mathjaxinline]i=1,2[/mathjaxinline]. Each die has sides labelled [mathjaxinline]1[/mathjaxinline], [mathjaxinline]2[/mathjaxinline], and [mathjaxinline]3[/mathjaxinline]. We roll the two dice independently, one roll for each die. For [mathjaxinline]i=1,2[/mathjaxinline], let the random variable [mathjaxinline]X_ i[/mathjaxinline] represent the result of the [mathjaxinline]i[/mathjaxinline]th die, so that [mathjaxinline]X_ i[/mathjaxinline] is uniformly distributed over the set [mathjaxinline]\{ 1, 2, 3\}[/mathjaxinline]. Define [mathjaxinline]X=X_2-X_1[/mathjaxinline]. &lt;/p&gt; &lt;ol class=&#34;enumerate&#34;&gt; &lt;li value=&#34;1&#34;&gt; &lt;p&gt; Calculate the numerical values of following probabilities, as well as the expected value and variance of [mathjaxinline]X[/mathjaxinline]: &lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt; &lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]\mathbf{P}(X=0)=\, \quad[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 1&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab2-problem2_2_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab2-problem2_2_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab2-problem2_2_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab2-problem2_2_1&#34; value=&#34;1/3&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab2-problem2_2_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab2-problem2_2_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab2-problem2_2_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;br/&gt; &lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]\mathbf{P}(X=1)=\, \quad[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 2&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab2-problem2_3_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab2-problem2_3_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab2-problem2_3_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab2-problem2_3_1&#34; value=&#34;2/9&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab2-problem2_3_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab2-problem2_3_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab2-problem2_3_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;br/&gt; &lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]\mathbf{P}(X=-2)=\, \quad[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 3&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab2-problem2_4_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab2-problem2_4_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab2-problem2_4_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab2-problem2_4_1&#34; value=&#34;1/9&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab2-problem2_4_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab2-problem2_4_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab2-problem2_4_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;br/&gt; &lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]\mathbf{P}(X=3)=\, \quad[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 4&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab2-problem2_5_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab2-problem2_5_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab2-problem2_5_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab2-problem2_5_1&#34; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab2-problem2_5_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;br/&gt; &lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]{\bf E}[X]=\, \quad[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 5&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab2-problem2_6_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab2-problem2_6_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab2-problem2_6_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab2-problem2_6_1&#34; value=&#34;0&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab2-problem2_6_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;br/&gt; &lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]\textsf{Var}(X)=\, \quad[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 6&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab2-problem2_7_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab2-problem2_7_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab2-problem2_7_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab2-problem2_7_1&#34; value=&#34;12/9&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab2-problem2_7_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab2-problem2_7_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab2-problem2_7_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;br/&gt; &lt;/p&gt; &lt;/li&gt; &lt;li value=&#34;2&#34;&gt; &lt;p&gt; Let [mathjaxinline]Y=X^2[/mathjaxinline]. Calculate the following probabilities: &lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt; &lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]\mathbf{P}(Y=0)=\, \quad[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; class="timeago" title="%(created_at)s">%(created_at)s</span>', {created_at: created_at}, true ); var postedTimeAgoMessage; // Using a separate message to ensure proper translation for different languages // thread_type describes the kind of post this is (e.g. "question" or "discussion"); // time_ago is how much time has passed since the post was created (e.g. "4 hours ago") if (thread_type === 'discussion') { postedTimeAgoMessage = gettext('discussion posted %(time_ago)s by %(author)s'); } else { postedTimeAgoMessage = gettext('question posted %(time_ago)s by %(author)s'); } %> <%= /* xss-lint: disable=underscore-not-escaped */ interpolate(_.escape(postedTimeAgoMessage), {time_ago: timeAgoHtml, author: author_display}, true) %> </p> <div class="post-labels"> <span class="post-label post-label-pinned"> <span class="icon fa fa-thumb-tack" aria-hidden="true"></span><%- gettext("Pinned") %> </span> <span class="post-label post-label-reported"> <span class="icon fa fa-flag" aria-hidden="true"></span><%- gettext("Reported") %> </span> <span class="post-label post-label-closed"> <span class="icon fa fa-lock" aria-hidden="true"></span><%- gettext("Closed") %> </span> </div> </div> </header> <div class="post-body"><%- body %></div> <div class="post-context"> <% if (mode === "tab" && obj.courseware_url) { %> <% var courseware_title_linked = interpolate( '<a href="%(courseware_url)s">%(courseware_title)s</a>', {courseware_url: courseware_url, courseware_title: _.escape(courseware_title)}, true ); %> <%= /* xss-lint: disable=underscore-not-escaped */ interpolate( _.escape(gettext('Related to: %(courseware_title_linked)s')), {courseware_title_linked: courseware_title_linked}, true ) %> <% } %> <div class="group-visibility-label"> <% if (obj.group_name && is_commentable_divided) { %> <%- interpolate( gettext('This post is visible only to %(group_name)s.'), {group_name: obj.group_name}, true ) %> <% } else { %> <%- gettext('This post is visible to everyone.') %> <% } %> </div> </div> </div> </script> <script aria-hidden="true" type="text/template" id="thread-edit-template"> <h<%- startHeader%> class="thread-title"><%- gettext("Editing post") %></h<%- startHeader%>> <ul class="post-errors"></ul> <div class="forum-edit-post-form-wrapper"></div> <div class="post-field"> <label class="field-label" for='edit-discussion-forum-title'> <span class="field-label-text"><%- gettext("Title") %></span> <div class="field-help" id="field_help_title"> <%- gettext("Add a clear and descriptive title to encourage participation. (Required)") %> </div> <input id='edit-discussion-forum-title' aria-describedby="field_help_title" type="text" class="edit-post-title field-input" name="title" value="<%- title %>"> </label> </div> <div class="form-row post-field"> <p class="sr-only field-help" id="edit-post-editor-description"><%- gettext('Edit your post below.') %></p> <div class="edit-post-body" aria-describedby="edit-post-editor-description" name="body"><%- body %></div> </div> <button type="submit" id="edit-post-submit" class="btn btn-primary submit post-update"><%- gettext("Update post") %></button> <button class="btn btn-outline-primary post-cancel"><%- gettext("Cancel") %></button> </script> <script aria-hidden="true" type="text/template" id="thread-response-template"> <div class="discussion-response"></div> <button class="btn-link action-show-comments"> <% var fmts = ngettext("Show Comment (%(num_comments)s)", "Show Comments (%(num_comments)s)", comments.length); print(interpolate(fmts, {num_comments: comments.length}, true)); %> <span class="icon fa fa-caret-down" aria-hidden="true"></span> </button> <ol class="comments"> <li class="new-comment"> <% if (create_sub_comment && !readOnly) { %> <form class="comment-form" data-id="<%- wmdId %>"> <ul class="discussion-errors"></ul> <label class="sr" for="add-new-comment-<%- wmdId %>"><%- gettext("Add a comment") %></label> <div class="comment-body" id="add-new-comment-<%- wmdId %>" data-id="<%- wmdId %>" data-placeholder="<%- gettext('Add a comment') %>"></div> <div class="comment-post-control"> <button class="btn btn-primary discussion-submit-comment control-button"><%- gettext("Submit") %></button> </div> </form> <% } %> </li> </ol> </script> <script aria-hidden="true" type="text/template" id="thread-response-show-template"> <header class="response-header"> <div class="response-header-content"> <%= HtmlUtils.HTML(author_display) %> <p class="posted-details"> <span class="timeago" title="<%= HtmlUtils.HTML(created_at) %>"><%= HtmlUtils.HTML(created_at) %></span> <% if (obj.endorsement && obj.endorsed) { %> - <% var fmt = null; if (thread.get("thread_type") == "question") { if (endorsement.username) { // Translators: time_ago is a placeholder for a fuzzy, relative timestamp // like "4 hours ago" or "about a month ago" fmt = gettext("marked as answer %(time_ago)s by %(user)s"); } else { // Translators: time_ago is a placeholder for a fuzzy, relative timestamp // like "4 hours ago" or "about a month ago" fmt = gettext("marked as answer %(time_ago)s"); } } else { if (endorsement.username) { // Translators: time_ago is a placeholder for a fuzzy, relative timestamp // like "4 hours ago" or "about a month ago" fmt = gettext("endorsed %(time_ago)s by %(user)s"); } else { // Translators: time_ago is a placeholder for a fuzzy, relative timestamp // like "4 hours ago" or "about a month ago" fmt = gettext("endorsed %(time_ago)s"); } } var time_ago = interpolate( '<span class="timeago" title="%(time)s">%(time)s</span>', {time: endorsement.time}, true ); %> <%= /* xss-lint: disable=underscore-not-escaped */ interpolate(fmt, {time_ago: time_ago, user: endorser_display}, true) %> <% } %> </p> <div class="post-labels"> <span class="post-label post-label-reported"> <span class="icon fa fa-flag" aria-hidden="true"></span><%- gettext("Reported") %> </span> </div> </div> <div class="response-header-actions"> <%= /* xss-lint: disable=underscore-not-escaped */ _.template( $('#forum-actions').html())( { contentId: cid, contentType: 'response', primaryActions: ['vote', thread.get('thread_type') == 'question' ? 'answer' : 'endorse'], secondaryActions: ['edit', 'delete', 'report'], readOnly: readOnly } ) %> </div> </header> <div class="response-body"><%- body %></div> </script> <script aria-hidden="true" type="text/template" id="thread-response-edit-template"> <div class="edit-post-form"> <h<%- startHeader %>><%- gettext("Editing response") %></h<%- startHeader %>> <ul class="edit-post-form-errors"></ul> <div class="form-row"> <div class="edit-post-body" name="body" data-id="<%- id %>"><%- body %></div> </div> <button type="submit" id="edit-response-submit"class="btn btn-primary post-update"><%- gettext("Update response") %></button> <button class="btn btn-outline-primary post-cancel"><%- gettext("Cancel") %></button> </div> </script> <script aria-hidden="true" type="text/template" id="response-comment-show-template"> <div class="discussion-comment" id="comment_<%- id %>"> <div class="response-body"><%- body %></div> <%= /* xss-lint: disable=underscore-not-escaped */ _.template( $('#forum-actions').html())( { contentId: cid, contentType: 'comment', primaryActions: [], secondaryActions: ['edit', 'delete', 'report'], readOnly: readOnly } ) %> <p class="posted-details"> <% var time_ago = interpolate( '<span class="timeago" title="%(time)s">%(time)s</span>', {time: created_at}, true ); %> <%= /* xss-lint: disable=underscore-not-escaped */ interpolate( // Translators: 'timeago' is a placeholder for a fuzzy, relative timestamp (see: https://github.com/rmm5t/jquery-timeago) gettext("posted %(time_ago)s by %(author)s"), {time_ago: time_ago, author: author_display}, true ) %> </p> <div class="post-labels"> <span class="post-label post-label-reported"> <span class="icon fa fa-flag" aria-hidden="true"></span><%- gettext("Reported") %> </span> </div> </div> </script> <script aria-hidden="true" type="text/template" id="response-comment-edit-template"> <div class="edit-post-form" id="comment_<%- id %>"> <h<%- startHeader %> ><%- gettext("Editing comment") %></h<%- startHeader%>> <ul class="edit-comment-form-errors"></ul> <div class="form-row"> <div class="edit-comment-body" name="body" data-id="<%- id %>"><%- body %></div> </div> <button type="submit" id="edit-comment-submit" class="btn btn-primary post-update"><%- gettext("Update comment") %></button> <button class="btn btn-outline-primary post-cancel"><%- gettext("Cancel") %></button> </div> </script> <script aria-hidden="true" type="text/template" id="thread-list-item-template"> <li data-id="<%- id %>" class="forum-nav-thread<% if (!hideReadState && neverRead) { %> never-read<% } %>"> <a href="<%- threadUrl %>" class="forum-nav-thread-link"> <div class="forum-nav-thread-wrapper-0"> <% var icon_class, sr_text; if (thread_type === "discussion") { icon_class = "fa-comments"; // Translators: This is a label for a Discussion forum thread sr_text = gettext("discussion"); } else if (endorsed) { icon_class = "fa-check-square-o"; // Translators: This is a label for a Question forum thread with a marked answer sr_text = gettext("answered question"); } else { icon_class = "fa-question"; // Translators: This is a label for a Question forum thread without a marked answer sr_text = gettext("unanswered question"); } %> <span class="sr"><%= HtmlUtils.HTML(sr_text) %></span> <span class="icon fa <%- icon_class %>" aria-hidden="true"></span> </div><div class="forum-nav-thread-wrapper-1"> <span class="forum-nav-thread-title"><%- title %></span> <% if (showThreadPreview){ %> <div class="thread-preview-body"><%- threadPreview %></div> <% } %> <% if(typeof(subscribed) === "undefined") { var subscribed = null; } %> <% if(pinned || subscribed || staff_authored || community_ta_authored) { %> <ul class="forum-nav-thread-labels"> <% if (pinned) { %> <li class="post-label post-label-pinned"> <span class="icon fa fa-thumb-tack" aria-hidden="true"></span> <% // Translators: This is a label for a forum thread that has been pinned %> <%- gettext("Pinned") %> </li> <% } %> <% if (subscribed) { %> <li class="post-label post-label-following"> <span class="icon fa fa-star" aria-hidden="true"></span> <% // Translators: This is a label for a forum thread that the user is subscribed to %> <%- gettext("Following") %> </li> <% } %> <% if (staff_authored) { %> <li class="post-label post-label-by-staff"> <span class="icon fa fa-user" aria-hidden="true"></span> <% // Translators: This is a label for a forum thread that was authored by a member of the course staff %> <%- gettext("Staff") %> </li> <% } %> <% if (community_ta_authored) { %> <li class="post-label post-label-by-community-ta"> <span class="icon fa fa-user" aria-hidden="true"></span> <% // Translators: This is a label for a forum thread that was authored by a community TA %> <%- gettext("Community TA") %> </li> <% } %> </ul> <% } %> </div><div class="forum-nav-thread-wrapper-2"> <% // Translators: 'votes_count' is a numerical placeholder for a specific discussion thread; 'span_start' and 'span_end' placeholders refer to HTML markup. Please translate the word 'votes'. var fmt = ngettext( "%(votes_count)s%(span_start)s vote %(span_end)s", "%(votes_count)s%(span_start)s votes %(span_end)s", votes['up_count'] ); %> <span class="forum-nav-thread-votes-count"> +<%= /* xss-lint: disable=underscore-not-escaped */ interpolate(fmt, { votes_count: votes['up_count'], span_start: '<span class="sr">', span_end: '</span>' }, true) %> </span> <% if (!hideReadState && !neverRead && unread_comments_count > 0) { %> <span class="forum-nav-thread-unread-comments-count"> <%- StringUtils.interpolate( gettext('{unread_comments_count} new'), {unread_comments_count: unread_comments_count} ) %> </span> <% } %> <span class="forum-nav-thread-comments-count"> <% var fmt; // Counts in data do not include the post itself, but the UI should var data = { 'span_sr_open': '<span class="sr">', 'span_close': '</span>', 'unread_comments_count': unread_comments_count + (read ? 0 : 1), 'comments_count': comments_count + 1 }; if (unread_comments_count > 0) { // Translators: 'comments_count' and 'unread_comments_count' are numerical placeholders for a specific discussion thread; 'span_*' placeholders refer to HTML markup. Please translate the word 'comments'. fmt = gettext('%(comments_count)s %(span_sr_open)scomments (%(unread_comments_count)s unread comments)%(span_close)s'); } else { // Translators: 'comments_count' is a numerical placeholder for a specific discussion thread; 'span_*' placeholders refer to HTML markup. Please translate the word 'comments'. fmt = gettext('%(comments_count)s %(span_sr_open)scomments %(span_close)s'); } print(interpolate(fmt, data, true)); %> </span> </div> </a> </li> </script> <script aria-hidden="true" type="text/template" id="search-alert-template"> <div class="search-alert <%- css_class %>" id="search-alert-<%- cid %>"> <div class="search-alert-content"> <p class="message"><%= HtmlUtils.ensureHtml(messageHtml) %></p> </div> <div class="search-alert-controls"> <button class="btn-link dismiss control control-dismiss" title="<%- gettext('Close') %>"> <span class="icon fa fa-remove" aria-hidden="true"></span> </button> </div> </div> </script> <script aria-hidden="true" type="text/template" id="new-post-template"> <form class="forum-new-post-form"> <h<%- startHeader %> class="thread-title"><%- gettext("Add a Post") %></h<%- startHeader %>> <% if (mode === 'inline') { %> <button class="btn btn-outline-primary btn-default add-post-cancel"> <span class="sr"><%- gettext('Cancel') %></span> <span class="fa fa-close" aria-hidden="true"></span> </button> <% } %> <ul class="post-errors" style="display: none"></ul> <div class="forum-new-post-form-wrapper"></div> <% if (group_options) { %> <div class="post-field group-selector-wrapper <% if (!is_commentable_divided) { print('disabled'); 4 / 2. <div class="course-expiration-message"><strong>Audit Access Expires <span class="localized-datetime" data-format="shortDate" data-datetime="2020-05-27" data-language="en">May 27, 2020</span></strong><br>You lose all access to this course, including your progress, on <span class="localized-datetime" data-format="shortDate" data-datetime="2020-05-27" data-language="en">May 27, 2020</span>.</div> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-vertical" data-course-id="course-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020" data-init="VerticalStudentView" data-block-type="vertical" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-graded="True" data-has-score="False" data-usage-id="block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@vertical+block@ch6-s7-tab3" data-request-token="33238a069be111eab73e0a9bb1fdf541" data-runtime-version="1"> <h2 class="hd hd-2 unit-title">3. PMF, expectation, and variance</h2> <div class="bookmark-button-wrapper"> <button class="btn btn-link bookmark-button " aria-pressed="false" data-bookmark-id="SY0628,block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@vertical+block@ch6-s7-tab3" data-bookmarks-api-url="/api/bookmarks/v1/bookmarks/"> <span class="bookmark-text">Bookmark this page</span> </button> </div> <div class="vert-mod"> <div class="vert vert-0" data-id="block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@problem+block@hw4-tab3-problem3"> <div class="xblock xblock-student_view xblock-student_view-problem xmodule_display xmodule_ProblemBlock" data-course-id="course-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020" data-init="XBlockToXModuleShim" data-block-type="problem" data-runtime-class="LmsRuntime" data-graded="True" data-has-score="True" data-usage-id="block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@problem+block@hw4-tab3-problem3" data-request-token="33238a069be111eab73e0a9bb1fdf541" data-runtime-version="1"> <script type="json/xblock-args" class="xblock-json-init-args"> {"xmodule-type": "Problem"} </script> <div id="problem_hw4-tab3-problem3" class="problems-wrapper" role="group" aria-labelledby="hw4-tab3-problem3-problem-title" data-problem-id="block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@problem+block@hw4-tab3-problem3" data-url="/courses/course-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020/xblock/block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@problem+block@hw4-tab3-problem3/handler/xmodule_handler" data-problem-score="6.0" data-problem-total-possible="6.0" data-attempts-used="2" data-content=" &lt;h3 class=&#34;hd hd-3 problem-header&#34; id=&#34;hw4-tab3-problem3-problem-title&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@problem+block@hw4-tab3-problem3-problem-progress&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34;&gt; Problem 3. PMF, expectation, and variance &lt;/h3&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;problem-progress&#34; id=&#34;block-v1:MITx+6.431x+1T2020+type@problem+block@hw4-tab3-problem3-problem-progress&#34;&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;problem&#34;&gt; &lt;div&gt; &lt;p&gt; The random variables [mathjaxinline]X[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]Y[/mathjaxinline] have the joint PMF &lt;/p&gt; &lt;table cellpadding=&#34;7&#34; cellspacing=&#34;0&#34; class=&#34;equation&#34; id=&#34;a0000000170&#34; style=&#34;table-layout:auto&#34; width=&#34;100%&#34;&gt; &lt;tr&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;equation&#34; style=&#34;width:80%; border:none&#34;&gt;[mathjax]p_{X,Y}(x,y) = \left\{ \begin{array}{rl} c\cdot (x+y)^2, &amp;amp; \mbox{if $x \in \{ 1, 2, 4\} $ and $y \in \{ 1,3\} $}, \\ 0, &amp;amp; \mbox{otherwise.} \end{array} \right.[/mathjax]&lt;/td&gt; &lt;td class=&#34;eqnnum&#34; style=&#34;width:20%; border:none&#34;&gt;&amp;#160;&lt;/td&gt; &lt;/tr&gt; &lt;/table&gt; &lt;p&gt; All answers in this problem should be numerical. &lt;/p&gt; &lt;ol class=&#34;enumerate&#34;&gt; &lt;li value=&#34;1&#34;&gt; &lt;p&gt; Find the value of the constant [mathjaxinline]c[/mathjaxinline]. &lt;br/&gt;&lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]c=\,[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 1&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab3-problem3_2_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab3-problem3_2_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab3-problem3_2_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab3-problem3_2_1&#34; value=&#34;1/128&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab3-problem3_2_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab3-problem3_2_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab3-problem3_2_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;br/&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;/li&gt; &lt;li value=&#34;2&#34;&gt; &lt;p&gt; Find [mathjaxinline]\mathbf{P}(Y &amp;lt; X)[/mathjaxinline]. &lt;br/&gt;&lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]\mathbf{P}(Y&amp;lt;X)=\,[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 2&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab3-problem3_3_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab3-problem3_3_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab3-problem3_3_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab3-problem3_3_1&#34; value=&#34;83/128&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab3-problem3_3_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab3-problem3_3_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab3-problem3_3_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;br/&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;/li&gt; &lt;li value=&#34;3&#34;&gt; &lt;p&gt; Find [mathjaxinline]\mathbf{P}(Y = X)[/mathjaxinline]. &lt;br/&gt;&lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]\mathbf{P}(Y = X)=\,[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 3&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab3-problem3_4_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab3-problem3_4_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab3-problem3_4_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab3-problem3_4_1&#34; value=&#34;4/128&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab3-problem3_4_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab3-problem3_4_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab3-problem3_4_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/p&gt; &lt;/li&gt; &lt;li value=&#34;4&#34;&gt; &lt;p&gt; Find the following probabilities. &lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt; (&lt;i class=&#34;itshape&#34;&gt;Hint&lt;/i&gt;: To avoid double jeopardy with later problem sets, the answers are [mathjaxinline]\frac{74}{128},\, \frac{34}{128},\, \frac{20}{128},\, 0,\,[/mathjaxinline] not necessarily in that order.)&lt;br/&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt; &lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]\mathbf{P}(X=1)=\, \quad[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 4&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab3-problem3_5_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab3-problem3_5_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab3-problem3_5_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab3-problem3_5_1&#34; value=&#34;20/128&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab3-problem3_5_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab3-problem3_5_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab3-problem3_5_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;br/&gt; &lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]\mathbf{P}(X=2)=\, \quad[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 5&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab3-problem3_6_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab3-problem3_6_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab3-problem3_6_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab3-problem3_6_1&#34; value=&#34;34/128&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab3-problem3_6_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab3-problem3_6_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab3-problem3_6_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;br/&gt; &lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]\mathbf{P}(X=3)=\, \quad[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 6&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab3-problem3_7_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab3-problem3_7_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab3-problem3_7_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab3-problem3_7_1&#34; value=&#34;0&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab3-problem3_7_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab3-problem3_7_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab3-problem3_7_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;br/&gt; &lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]\mathbf{P}(X=4)=\, \quad[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 7&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab3-problem3_8_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab3-problem3_8_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab3-problem3_8_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab3-problem3_8_1&#34; value=&#34;74/128&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab3-problem3_8_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab3-problem3_8_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab3-problem3_8_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;/p&gt; &lt;/li&gt; &lt;li value=&#34;5&#34;&gt; &lt;p&gt; Find the expectations [mathjaxinline]{\bf E}[X][/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]{\bf E}[XY][/mathjaxinline]. &lt;/p&gt; &lt;p&gt; &lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]{\bf E}[X]=\, \quad[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 8&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab3-problem3_9_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab3-problem3_9_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab3-problem3_9_1&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab3-problem3_9_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab3-problem3_9_1&#34; class=&#34;answer&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt; &lt;br/&gt; &lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]{\bf E}[XY]=\, \quad[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 9&#34; role=&#34;group&#34;&gt;&lt;div id=&#34;inputtype_hw4-tab3-problem3_10_1&#34; class=&#34; capa_inputtype inline textline&#34;&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;correct inline&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;text&#34; name=&#34;input_hw4-tab3-problem3_10_1&#34; id=&#34;input_hw4-tab3-problem3_10_1&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;status_hw4-tab3-problem3_10_1&#34; value=&#34;908/128&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;trailing_text&#34; id=&#34;trailing_text_hw4-tab3-problem3_10_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;status correct&#34; id=&#34;status_hw4-tab3-problem3_10_1&#34; data-tooltip=&#34;This answer is correct.&#34;&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;correct&lt;/span&gt;&lt;span class=&#34;status-icon&#34; aria-hidden=&#34;true&#34;/&gt; &lt;/span&gt; &lt;p id=&#34;answer_hw4-tab3-problem3_10_1&#34; &lt;p&gt; &lt;p style=&#34;display:inline&#34;&gt;[mathjaxinline]\textsf{Var}(X)=\, \quad[/mathjaxinline]&lt;/p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;inline&#34; tabindex=&#34;-1&#34; aria-label=&#34;Question 10&#34; &lt;p&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;solution-span&#34;&gt; &lt;span id=&#34;solution_hw4-tab3-problem3_solution_1&#34;/&gt; &lt;/div&gt;&lt;/p&gt; &lt;/div&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;action&#34;&gt; &lt;input type=&#34;hidden&#34; name=&#34;problem_id&#34; value=&#34;Problem 3. PMF, expectation, and variance&#34; /&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;submit-attempt-container&#34;&gt; &lt;button type=&#34;button&#34; class=&#34;submit btn-brand&#34; data-submitting=&#34;Submitting&#34; data-value=&#34;Submit&#34; data-should-enable-submit-button=&#34;False&#34; aria-describedby=&#34;submission_feedback_hw4-tab3-problem3&#34; disabled&gt; &lt;span class=&#34;submit-label&#34;&gt;Submit&lt;/span&gt; &lt;/button&gt; &lt;div class=&#34;submission-feedback&#34; id=&#34;submission_feedback_hw4-tab3-problem3&#34;&gt; You have used 2 of 5 attempts &lt;span class=&#34;sr&#34;&gt;Some problems have options such as save, reset, hints, or show answer. languages // thread_type describes the kind of post this is (e.g. "question" or "discussion"); // time_ago is how much time has passed since the post was created (e.g. "4 hours ago") if (thread_type
